resume.title: About
value: I'm Clovis, a senior software developer who craft products and make nice things to automate process. I'm curious of all technologies related to web, mobile and data, user interaction and experience.

Apart from hi-tech field, I like running, swimming, hiking, and traveling. During my master study, I have had one year exchange experience in China, which finally interests me to explore more in the culture and learn Chinese.
